summary: As a man leaves his wife and daughter, a series of brief conversations, observed gestures, chance encounters and impulsive acts, tell the story of the relationships that flounder and thrive in the wake of this decision.
cast: Louis Garrel|Anna Mouglalis|Rebecca Convenant|Olga Milshtein|Esther Garrel|Arthur Igual|Jérôme Huguet|Manon Kneusé|Eric Ruillat|Robert Bazil|Jean Pommier|Julien Lucas|Sofia Teillet|Florence Payros|Nicolas Thuet|Mathilde Bisson|Emanuela Ponzano|Guillaume Rannou|Anthony Paliotti|Sonia Floire|Stéphanie Farison|Laetitia Spigarelli|Grégory Quidel
title: La jalousie
